commit.message:
linux-unwind.h (mips_fallback_frame_state): Use CFA to find sigcontext.

2007-11-14  David Daney  <ddaney@avtrex.com>

	* config/mips/linux-unwind.h (mips_fallback_frame_state): Use CFA
	to find sigcontext.

From-SVN: r130194

files.patch:

+	* config/mips/linux-unwind.h (mips_fallback_frame_state): Use CFA
+	to find sigcontext.
